entities.name: beauxbatons students
entities.description: The group of students from Beauxbatons Academy who are visiting Hogwarts.

entities.name: madame maxime
entities.description: Madame Maxime, the Transfiguration teacher from Beauxbatons Academy, is leading the students back to their carriage.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is following Madame Maxime and the Beauxbatons students, curious about where they are sleeping.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione Granger returns with a box of S.P.E.W. badges and encourages Ron to hurry up.

entities.name: hagrid's cabin
entities.description: The location where Hagrid lives, near the edge of the Forbidden Forest.

entities.name: s.p.e.w. badges
entities.description: A box of S.P.E.W. (Society for the Promotion of Elfish Welfare) badges that Hermione brought with her.

relationships.description: Madame Maxime is leading the Beauxbatons students back to their carriage.
Ron Weasley is following Madame Maxime and the Beauxbatons students.
Hermione Granger encourages Ron to hurry up as they are following Madame Maxime and the Beauxbatons students.
The Beauxbatons students are near Hagrid's cabin, which is located on the edge of the Forbidden Forest.
The Beauxbatons students have S.P.E.W. badges, which Hermione brought with her.
